full_text:
REDUCTION OF FEES.

	In the event that the State law authorizing the collection of the ten dollar ($10.00) fee for the State should no longer be in effect, the fee to be charged by the Community Development Department for each application shall be twenty-five dollars ($25.00).

1.name: Enterprise Zone Hiring Tax Credit Voucher Application Fees
1.label: article

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

REDUCTION OF FEES. (§ 21.17.3)

  REDUCTION OF FEES.	In the event that the State law authorizing the collection
of the ten dollar ($10.00) fee for the State should no longer be in effect, the
fee to be charged by the Community Development Department for each application
shall be twenty-five dollars ($25.00).

REDUCTION OF FEES.

In the event that the State law authorizing the collection of the ten dollar ($10.00) fee for the State should no longer be in effect, the fee to be charged by the Community Development Department for each application shall be twenty-five dollars ($25.00).
